description:
User-Friendly message is not displayed while trying to delete a non-exist image

Steps to reproduce :

glance delete imageid

Expected Result :

Error message which indicates the image does not exist

Actual Result :

The image is deleted again.
title: friendly message is not displayed for not existed image deletion

comments.content:
User-Friendly message is not displayed while trying to delete a non-exist image

Steps to reproduce :

glance delete imageid

Expected Result :

Error message which indicates the image does not exist

Actual Result :

The image is deleted again.
